sqlMap.select:
select a.departmentid, a.monitorid, a.factorid, a.unit, a.clock, b.QUARTER1 as "quarter1", b.QUARTER2 as "quarter2", b.QUARTER3 as "quarter3", b.QUARTER4 as "quarter4" from (select department_id as departmentid,monitorid as monitorid,factorid as factorid,'$clock$' as clock,unit as unit from ${hbSchema}.t_ha_department d,${hbSchema}.t_hd_total_plan_factor f where d.totalplan='1') as a left join ${hbSchema}.t_hd_total_plan_value b on(a.departmentid=b.departmentid and a.monitorid=b.monitorid and a.factorid=b.factorid and a.clock=b.clock) where 1=1
a.factorid = #factorid#
a.monitorid = #monitorid#
a.departmentid = #departmentid#
$orderBy$
a.departmentid,a.monitorid,a.factorid

select count(*) from (select department_id as departmentid,monitorid as monitorid,factorid as factorid,'$clock$' as clock,unit as unit from ${hbSchema}.t_ha_department d,${hbSchema}.t_hd_total_plan_factor f where d.totalplan='1') as a left join ${hbSchema}.t_hd_total_plan_value b on(a.departmentid=b.departmentid and a.monitorid=b.monitorid and a.factorid=b.factorid and a.clock=b.clock) where 1=1
a.factorid = #factorid#
a.monitorid = #monitorid#
a.departmentid = #departmentid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TOTAL_PLAN_VALUE (MONITORID, FACTORID, DEPARTMENTID, CLOCK, QUARTER1, QUARTER2, QUARTER3, QUARTER4 ) VALUES (#monitorid:VARCHAR#, #factorid:VARCHAR#, #departmentid:VARCHAR#, #clock:VARCHAR#, #quarter1:NUMERIC#, #quarter2:NUMERIC#, #quarter3:NUMERIC#, #quarter4:NUMERIC#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TOTAL_PLAN_VALUE WHERE MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid# AND CLOCK = #clock#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HD_TOTAL_PLAN_VALUE SET QUARTER1 = #quarter1:NUMERIC#, QUARTER2 = #quarter2:NUMERIC#, QUARTER3 = #quarter3:NUMERIC#, QUARTER4 = #quarter4:NUMERIC# WHERE MONITORID = #monitorid# AND FACTORID = #factorid# AND DEPARTMENTID = #departmentid# AND CLOCK = #clock#
sqlMap.select: SELECT MONITORID as "monitorid", MONITORNAME as "monitorname" FROM ${hbSchema}.t_ha_monitor where MONITORID in(select monitorid from ${hbSchema}.t_hd_total_plan_factor)
